title: Visualizing the medical data explosion
description: Medical scans can produce thousands of images for a single patient in seconds, but how do doctors know what's useful? Scientific visualization expert Anders Ynnerman shows us sophisticated new tools -- like virtual autopsies -- for analyzing our data, and hints at the sci-fi-sounding medical technologies coming up next. This talk contains some graphic medical imagery.
author: Anders Ynnerman
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, data, health, medicine, science, technology, visualizations, virtual reality
